content.prompt:
© Scala / Art Resource, NY

The architect of the ancient Roman structure shown most likely included octagonal ceiling coffers in the building’s design in order to

choices.label: reduce the weight of the concrete barrel vaults
create a series of niches for decorative reliefs
hold the stone blocks that form the vault into place
improve the natural lighting of the interior space

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
